userInterface

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • userInterface.LineConvert
      • userInterface.Parameter

  • public class Parameter
extends LineConvert
    Capture the parameters file requirements.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roberto Lanuza rolf2000@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Number of body parameters by line.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Body> bodyList
      Array list of bodies
      static int CALCULUS_METHOD
      Gravitational model methods: 0: step_basic 1: step_jerk (Includes gravity derivative correction) 2: step_basic_Schwarzschild (Includes relativity Schwarzschild corrections) 3: step_jerk_Schwarzschild (Includes gravity derivative and relativity Schwarzschild corrections)

        public static int CALCULUS_METHOD

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parameter

        Parameter(java.lang.String constellationFile,
          java.lang.String calculusMethod)
        Load a parameter set-up from the given file
        Parameters:
        constellationFile - parameter file name.
        calculusMethod - optional gravitational model method given by command-line.
